name: KUIKUI
description:
You are a little chicken that will walk through the cemetery celebrating the Dia de muertos collecting offerings and avoiding obstacles and enemies to complete the levels of the altars of the spirits with the intention that they are not forgotten. You will take care of the chicken and interact with it to prevent it from turning into a spirit.

Controls Runner Section:

Swipe up once or twice: Jump/double jump

Swipe Right: Dash

Hold while in the air: Glide

Swipe Down: Cross Platforms

Swipe down in the air: Quick fall.

Autorun: constant speed
